word_mean: 礁体呈环带状围绕着封闭、半封闭潟湖生长发育的一种珊瑚礁。
由大量生长的造礁石珊瑚骨骼所构成的环形珊瑚礁，中间有不太深（100 m以内）的潟湖，出口较窄。

encyclopedia.content: 函数名： atoll 功 能： 把字符串转换成长长整型数（64位） 用 法： long long atoll(const char *nptr); 注：unix下可用，与atol、atoi等类似

entry.def: An atoll is a ring of coral rock, or a group of coral islands surrounding a lagoon.

means.word_mean: 1. an island consisting of a circular coral reef surrounding a lagoon

auth_sentence.content: The plan involves tourists, rare turtles and a remote atoll.
auth_sentence.res_content: The plan involves tourists, rare turtles and a remote atoll.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The plan involves tourists, rare turtles and a remote atoll.

auth_sentence.content: The organisation is also trying to set up a permanent research station in the atoll, to compile year-round data on the animals.
auth_sentence.res_content: The organisation is also trying to set up a permanent research station in the atoll, to compile year-round data on the animals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The organisation is also trying to set up a permanent research station in the atoll, to compile year-round data on the animals.

auth_sentence.content: It is a triptych, three panels of a coral reef, a coral lagoon island, which is called an atoll.
